9bff58ad6c0dc366eca173517ccde6d69ed4f74b.commit.message:
Fix for a findbugs warning in HierarchicalConfiguration: the non serializable field expressionEngine was made transient. This should not be a problem because serialization of Configuration objects never worked. This is something that needs to be addressed in the next major release.
